database

Class DbReports

  • public class DbReports
extends java.lang.Object
    Queries for the reports table in the database

      • getReports

        public static java.util.List<ModelReports> getReports()
        Query that retrieves all reports and generates a list of ModelReports objects that each contain information about one report
        Returns:
        List of ModelReports objects

      • getReport

        public static ModelReports getReport(java.lang.String koiename)
        Query for getting one report on a given koie. Used to check if a koie atleast has one report
        Parameters:
        koiename - name of the koie you want to get report from
        Returns:
        ModelReports object with info about the report

      • checkReport

        public static boolean checkReport(java.lang.String koieName,
                                  java.lang.String startDate,
                                  java.lang.String endDate)
        Query to check if there is a report in the database with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        koieName - name of the koie
        startDate - start date of the koie stay
        endDate - end date of the koie stay
        Returns:
        true if there is a report from that time period on that koie name. False if not.

      • getReports

        public static java.util.List<ModelReports> getReports(java.lang.String koieName)
        Query for getting all reports on a given koie
        Parameters:
        koieName - Name of the koie you want to get all reports from
        Returns:
        A list of ModelReports objects
